org.apache.accumulo.cluster.standalone

Class StandaloneClusterControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.cluster.standalone.StandaloneClusterControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterControl

    public class StandaloneClusterControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterControl
    Use the RemoteShell to control a standalone (possibly distibuted) Accumulo instance
